org.fcrepo.client

Interface FedoraResource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FedoraDatastream, FedoraObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FedoraDatastreamImpl, FedoraObjectImpl, FedoraResourceImpl

    public interface FedoraResource
    Superclass of Fedora Objects and Datastreams containing common functionality.
    Since:
    2014-08-01
    Author:
    escowles

      • updateProperties

        void updateProperties(InputStream updatedProperties,
                      String contentType)
               throws FedoraException
        Update the properties of this Resource with the provided RDF.
        Parameters:
        updatedProperties - RDF properties as an InputStream.
        contentType - Content type of the RDF in updatedProperties (e.g., "text/rdf+n3" or "application/rdf+xml").
        Throws:
        FedoraException

                    throws FedoraException

        Parameters:
        label - the label for the version (must conform to naming requirements enforced by the repository).
        Throws:
        FedoraException
